title: RIR ince in US-effect on USD relative to peso

content.question: Assume that the real interest rate in the United States increases relative to the real interest rate in Mexico. Which of the following will happen to the supply of United States dollars and the dollar exchange rate relative to the Mexican peso in foreign exchange markets?

choices.label: The supply of dollars will increase, and the dollar will appreciate.
The supply of dollars will increase, and the dollar will depreciate.
The supply of dollars will decrease, and the dollar will appreciate.
The supply of dollars will decrease, and the dollar will depreciate.
The supply of dollars will decrease and the effect on the value of the dollar is indeterminate.

content.answer: The supply of dollars will decrease, and the dollar will appreciate.

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.6: Real Interest Rates and International Capital Flows

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
